Lyric:
[by:OversG]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00]"About The Money"(ft.Young Thug)
[00:19.03]Bustin' out the bando
[00:20.76]A nigga jewelry real metal like a can opener
[00:22.95]I went from rags to riches to a feature with Tip
[00:25.54]I went from Smart Car to a bitch with some smart lips
[00:27.72]And the F&N make my hip limp
[00:30.16]I'm goin' fishin' with these little bitty shrimp dips
[00:32.41]And my bank roll got a big dip
[00:34.78]She gon' bring it on a big ship
[00:37.14]Quite trill, no Quik Trip
[00:39.59]I got drugs in the alley, no tip there
[00:41.83]She just wanna have a good day
[00:44.37]Smoke way more weed than a guy in L.A
[00:46.78]I want them birds 'til next May
[00:49.31]Never let em fly away
[00:51.86]What!? I heard ay
[00:54.05]Listen what my nigga Tip say
[00:56.08]If it ain't about the money
[00:57.51]Don't be blowin' me up, nigga I ain't gettin' up
[01:00.26]If it ain't about the money
[01:01.73]Ain't no use in you ringin' my line, stop wastin' my time
[01:05.15]If it ain't about the money
[01:06.36]Nah I can't even hear what you say, I ain't finna do shit
[01:09.81]If it ain't about the money
[01:11.08]Bitch, you can miss me with it, bitch nigga miss me with it
[01:14.41]I'm packin' 11, I'm packin' 11
[01:19.66]I ride in a gator, my shoes are Guiseppe
[01:25.04]I'm slime like the reverend, I shoot at the reverend
[01:29.66]Pants out the grocery store, they stuck with lettuce
[01:34.17]She try make the extras, I told on these bitches
[01:38.78]When it's bout time to pay I'ma bail on these bitches
[01:43.50]Ay what you think we in the neighborhood for?
[01:45.46]Standin' at the corner store with a pocket full of dough
[01:48.19]I'll be damned if a nigga wipe a hood hoe
[01:50.16]Learned that from UGK back in "Pocket Full of Stones"
[01:53.11]Put your money down I could book a hard four
[01:54.82]You playin' with it, I'ma send 'em through your car door
[01:57.08]But while I flood the shit sick got prob' oh
[01:59.54]I'm doin' it for black and yellow, free Hardo
[02:01.75]The head honcho, nigga no Tonto, nigga
[02:04.47]I'm quick to put some bricks in a Bronco, nigga
[02:06.83]Niggas talk shit, well I don't respond to no nigga
[02:09.15]No murder, no dough, no convo
[02:11.00]If it ain't about the money
[02:12.61]Don't be blowin' me up, nigga I ain't gettin' up

[02:54.37]When it's bout time to pay I'ma bail on these bitches
[02:57.94]Aye, what you think we in the neighborhood for?
[03:00.35]Standin in the trap, slangin good blow
[03:02.86]Maybach used to slang that crack
[03:05.73]Buy a stolen car while he bang that AK
[03:07.89]If you ever took a loss better bring that back
[03:10.00]Catcha' witcha' betcha' heat will blow your brains bout that
[03:12.11]Know you better be, on your best behavior when addressing me
[03:16.94]Because, bye-gones, we don't let em be
[03:19.36]Niggas disrespect me, I'm a catch a felony
[03:21.66]For real, if you listen I can get you paid
[03:23.98]But not interested in shit you say
[03:25.75]If it ain't about the money
